title: Stop Taking Our GPUs, Miners!

A Geekbench has all for an Alder Lake-S CPU has popped up ,supporting 16 cores and 24 threads. The benchmark has so many cores. Meaning, powerful and in this case, multi-threading capable cores are supplemented by smaller more power efficient cores. In any case, if these Geekbench results are to be believed, it's a setup that might work for Intel as there is some discussion that with slightly higher clock speeds, the CPU could outperform AMD's Ryzen 5950 X. But these chips aren't supposed to come out for at least another year.
